name: @dracoon-official/crypto-sdk
description: The official Dracoon Crypto SDK for JavaScript
author: DRACOON

scripts.integration-test:browser: mkdir -p  ./integration-tests/pkg && npm pack --pack-destination  ./integration-tests/pkg && (cd  ./integration-tests/browser && npm run integration-test)
scripts.integration-test:node: mkdir -p  ./integration-tests/pkg && npm pack --pack-destination  ./integration-tests/pkg && (cd  ./integration-tests/node && npm run integration-test)
scripts.integration-test: npm run integration-test:browser && npm run integration-test:node
scripts.integration-test:ci:browser: mkdir -p ${CI_PROJECT_DIR}/integration-tests/pkg && npm pack --pack-destination ${CI_PROJECT_DIR}/integration-tests/pkg && cd ${CI_PROJECT_DIR}/integration-tests/browser && npm run integration-test:ci
scripts.integration-test:ci:node: mkdir -p ${CI_PROJECT_DIR}/integration-tests/pkg && npm pack --pack-destination ${CI_PROJECT_DIR}/integration-tests/pkg && cd ${CI_PROJECT_DIR}/integration-tests/node && npm run integration-test:ci
scripts.integration-test:ci: npm run integration-test:ci:browser && npm run integration-test:ci:node
